changes: Added detailed comments about CSRF protection and origin validation
Introduced new environment variables for origin validation
Added same origin validation configuration and comments

patterns_discovered: Defense-in-depth security approach for CSRF protection
Flexible origin validation with warn/block modes
Multi-domain deployment support via environment configuration
gotchas_discovered: Potential security risks if ORIGIN_VALIDATION_MODE is set to 'warn'
Need to manually configure ADDITIONAL_ALLOWED_ORIGINS for complex deployments

approach_outcome.description: Added comprehensive origin validation documentation to .env example files

recommendations: Consider defaulting ORIGIN_VALIDATION_MODE to 'block' in production
Document the recommended configuration for different deployment scenarios
Implement runtime validation of these configuration parameters
